Articles.Content:
What mod is this?

Can you send me a PM with it and the ship?

> 
> **What mod is this?**
> 
> Can you send me a PM with it and the ship?

I believe that this uses Probodobodyne\* DIY Probe Kit, and NovaPunch Remix Packs.

They can be found in the 'Addon Releases' section of the forum

\*Someone tell me if I spelled that right

Exactly right, good eye

List of mods I have are

Probodobodyne Probe kit

Novapunch 1.1a

C7Studios all packs

Dace .31

KW challenger Pack

IFE 1.4.2(Intrepid pack)

Zoxygene .5

Zo2 Powertech

Mechjeb 1.8.1

Orbital Construction V4

Docking Node add-on

Tuned-AdvSAS 0.2

Damned Areospace and Robotics

Muon Detector 1.0

EDIT: Post changed with initial ship, forgot to include it
